(Vamprah is still in stasis lock convulsing by
dischards of energy)

:: Vamprah ::

Dischards of energy were increased to unbeared
proportions, making that Vamprah shaking and scream
with pain and started to hit the cr.

Her moans and hits could be hearded outside cr.

--- Yanshosh@... wrote:
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> DevilDuer smiles as Diamond walks up to him. She
> seemed to know what 
> she was doing, it'd be a waist to reprogramm her and
> possibly lose 
> those skills.
> 
> "Third would be about accurate, I guess," he says,
> walking after 
> her, "We don' really have defined ranks after
> second."
> 
> He realizes that they were walking away from the CR
> chambers. "The CR 
> room's back that way," he says, pointing behind him.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > Diamond::
> > 
> > She knew that what he said about the drain was
> most likely correct 
> > and not a bluff.  She knew she had to use her
> wits.  This bot 
> seemed 
> > very intelegent and possably could make a strong
> ally.  He had said 
> > he was high up in the ranks. This opened a window
> of opertunity for 
> > her.  She transformed into bot mode and walked
> over to Devilduer.
> > 
> > "Very well, I shall accompany you to where ever
> you need me.  I am 
> in 
> > need of a cr." she said, looking down at her burn
> marks and leaking 
> > gun shot holes. 
> > "I shall join you.  You said earlier that you were
> high up in the 
> > ranks? That you make you...what..second, third in
> command?"  She 
> > bowed and showed proper respect to a higher
> ranking officer. On 
> > Cybertron, he wuld have been bowing to her, but
> then again, she 
> > wasn't on Cybertron.  "I shall follow you
> commander."  she stood up 
> > and looked at him.  Taking a few steps closer to
> him, she said in a 
> > hushed voice, "And I meant what I said earlier, we
> would have made 
> a 
> > good team back home." She smiled at him and then
> started to walked 
> > down the hallway. Then she turned and faced him,
> "Ah, which way to 
> > your CR room?"
> 
>
